channel.title: App Engine Task Queue on Codetab
channel.description: Recent content in App Engine Task Queue on Codetab

item.title: Task Queue - GWT Tutorial - CodeTab
item.description: 11.3.Â Task Queue Once we have Symbols in the cache, all that it takes to persist is to retrieve them, one by one, from the cache and persist with a call to JDO. This simple task seems to be achievable through RPC, but it will not work as intended on App Engine. Let’s understand the limitations imposed by the App Engine. RPC has to be completed within 60 seconds, and when there are few symbols, call may finish within the deadline.
